oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A regularity class for the roots of non-negative functions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ray, Kolyan
Schmidt-Hieber, Johannes
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Functional Analysis
26A16, 26A27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We investigate the regularity of the positive roots of a non-negative function of one-variable. A modified H\"older space $\mathcal{H}^\beta$ is introduced such that if $f\in \mathcal{H}^\beta$ then $f^\alpha \in C^{\alpha \beta}$. This provides sufficient conditions to overcome the usual limitation in the square root case ($\alpha = 1/2$) for H\"older functions that $f^{1/2}$ need be no more than $C^1$ in general. Using a wavelet decomposition of $f^\alpha$, we derive norm bounds that quantify this relationship.
